function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Absence of large scale testing for COVID-19","Impact":"Inability to accurately identify the actual number of infected patients","Mitigation":"Increase access to large scale testing facilities and implement widespread testing programs","Technologies":"Testing kits, laboratory equipment, and automation technology for testing facilities","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and public health authorities","Owner":"Government health departments and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate contact tracing","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and isolating individuals with a history of exposure to infected persons","Mitigation":"Implement comprehensive contact tracing programs, utilize digital contact tracing apps, and increase resources for contact tracing teams","Technologies":"Contact tracing applications, data analytics, and digital tools for monitoring and tracking","People":"Public health authorities, contact tracing teams, and individuals with a history of exposure","Owner":"Health departments and technology companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate access to accurate COVID-19 tests","Impact":"Inability to detect and diagnose SARS-CoV-2 infection in individuals, leading to uncontrolled transmission","Mitigation":"Develop and deploy accurate and reliable molecular tests at scale, establish testing facilities in strategic locations, and ensure accessibility to testing for the population","Technologies":"Nucleic Acid Amplification Tests (NAAT), sample collection devices, and laboratory testing equipment","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and individuals seeking testing","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government health agencies, and public health organizations"}]}
